text: [Music]
if you're gonna make a spinach and
strawberry salad make it be this one
because it is so good and I think that
the secret to this one is there's a
combination of sort of salty briny feta
cheese and toasty sesame seeds to
balance out the sweetness of the
strawberries and for a little more
crunch some toasted almonds it's
fantastic and trust me when I say that
because I don't even usually really like
spinach salad
start off by hulling and slicing six
ounces of strawberries then they slice
them all right so this strawberries
aside and make your dressing you do that
right in the bowl that you're going to
toss your spinach so that everything
comes together right there a tablespoon
of white balsamic I like the sweetness
that you get from this but if you don't
have white balsamic just use white wine
vinegar and then add a pinch of sugar
and you should approximate the flavor
two tablespoons of olive oil and then
some salt and pepper crumble in about
two ounces of feta cheese
don't make it too broken down because
you're going to toss your salad with
this and so it's gonna get broken down
more so leave it kind of big a
tablespoon of toasted sesame seeds these
are white sesame seeds so they're nice
and golden about a quarter cup of
almonds that have been toasted chopped
those not too finely just so that you're
not getting one big hunk of almond in
every bite but please make sure that
they're fully toasted no white on the
inside they should be like a pale golden
those can go into the bowl with the
dressing fantastic salad the
strawberries can go in if you want your
dressing to taste a little bit more like
strawberry just take the strawberries
and the vinegar and macerate them for
like ten minutes before you add the rest
of your stuff then the juices will
really get pulled out it will however
make your dressing a little bit red
which might freak people out time for
the spinach about four cups of baby
spinach you can use any spinach that you
like just nice tender leaves flat leaves
spinach works as well I guess the curly
spinach wouldn't work that well but I
don't know how many of you use that I
like it it's actually my favorite kind
of spinach
but I feel like people like to buy the
stuff in the containers better and
that's it your salad is done I really

sort of coat the leaves of the spinach
here it takes it just to that next level
that I think is really important if

I think I'm giving myself all the
